name: Fear Smith
damage_resistances: bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from attacks not made with cold iron weapons

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The fear smith makes three Claw attacks. It can replace one attack with a use of Heart-Stopping Stare.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 12 (2d8 + 3) slashing damage plus 9 (2d8) psychic damage. If the target is disoriented by Distortion Gaze, the fear smith regains hp equal to the amount of psychic damage dealt.

actions.name: Heart-Stopping Stare
actions.desc: The fear smith terrifies a creature within 30 feet of it with a look. The target must succeed on a DC 16 Wisdom saving throw or take 13 (3d8) psychic damage and be stunned until the end of its next turn. The fear smith regains hp equal to the psychic damage dealt.

actions.name: Spellcasting
actions.desc:
The fear smith casts one of the following spells, requiring no verbal or material components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 16):
At will: detect thoughts, fear
2/day each: charm person, command

special_abilities.name: Distortion Gaze
special_abilities.desc: Those who meet the gaze of the fear smith experience the world seeming to twist at unnatural angles beneath their feet. When a creature that can see the fear smith's eye starts its turn within 30 feet of the fear smith, the fear smith can force the creature to make a DC 16 Wisdom saving throw if the fear smith isn't incapacitated and can see the creature. On a failed save, the creature is disoriented until the start of its next turn. While disoriented, a creature can't take the Dash or Disengage action, and when it moves for the first time on its turn, it must succeed on a DC 16 Dexterity saving throw or fall prone.

special_abilities.name: Hidden Eye
special_abilities.desc: The fear smith has advantage on saving throws against being blinded.

special_abilities.name: Magic Resistance
special_abilities.desc: The fear smith has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.
